meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7471.

td.p: Alex Bourzutschky, a junior at Caltech from Potomac, Maryland
Lilly Chin, a senior at MIT from Decatur, Georgia
Julia Marsan, a senior at Georgetown University from Brookfield, Wisconsin

tr.td: ALL IN A DAY'S WORK
ART & ARTISTS
SILENT "K"
MATH 4U
NAMED FOR A PLACE
LET'S RAP, KIDS!
